identity.Description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

kafkaRestProperties.Description: The cluster kafka rest proxy configuration.

clusterHdpVersion.Description: The hdp version of the cluster.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

createdDate.Description: The date on which the cluster was created.

componentVersion.Description: The versions of different services in the cluster.

clientGroupInfo.Description: The information of AAD security group.

configurationOverride.Description: The configurations that need to be overriden.

organizationalUnitDN.Description: The organizational unit within the Active Directory to place the cluster and service accounts.

ldapsUrls.Description: The LDAPS protocol URLs to communicate with the Active Directory.

domainUsername.Description: The domain user account that will have admin privileges on the cluster.

clusterUsersGroupDNs.Description: Optional. The Distinguished Names for cluster user groups

aaddsResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the user's Azure Active Directory Domain Service.

msiResourceId.Description: User assigned identity that has permissions to read and create cluster-related artifacts in the user's AADDS.

roles.Description: The list of roles in the cluster.

minInstanceCount.Description: The minimum instance count of the cluster.

targetInstanceCount.Description: The instance count of the cluster.

VMGroupName.Description: The name of the virtual machine group.

dataDisksGroups.Description: The data disks groups for the role.

scriptActions.Description: The list of script actions on the role.

encryptDataDisks.Description: Indicates whether encrypt the data disks.

minInstanceCount.Description: The minimum instance count of the cluster

maxInstanceCount.Description: The maximum instance count of the cluster

timeZone.Description: The time zone for the autoscale schedule times

days.Description: Days of the week for a schedule-based autoscale rule

timeAndCapacity.Description: Time and capacity for a schedule-based autoscale rule

minInstanceCount.Description: The minimum instance count of the cluster

maxInstanceCount.Description: The maximum instance count of the cluster

publicKeys.Description: The list of SSH public keys.

id.Description: The ID of the virtual network.

disksPerNode.Description: The number of disks per node.

storageAccountType.Description: ReadOnly. The storage account type. Do not set this value.

diskSizeGB.Description: ReadOnly. The DiskSize in GB. Do not set this value.

name.Description: The name of the script action.

parameters.Description: The parameters for the script provided.

storageaccounts.Description: The list of storage accounts in the cluster.

name.Description: The name of the storage account.

isDefault.Description: Whether or not the storage account is the default storage account.

container.Description: The container in the storage account, only to be specified for WASB storage accounts.

fileSystem.Description: The filesystem, only to be specified for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2.

resourceId.Description: The resource ID of storage account, only to be specified for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2.

msiResourceId.Description: The managed identity (MSI) that is allowed to access the storage account, only to be specified for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 2.

vaultUri.Description: Base key vault URI where the customers key is located eg. https://myvault.vault.azure.net

keyName.Description: Key name that is used for enabling disk encryption.

keyVersion.Description: Specific key version that is used for enabling disk encryption.

encryptionAlgorithm.Description: Algorithm identifier for encryption, default RSA-OAEP.

msiResourceId.Description: Resource ID of Managed Identity that is used to access the key vault.

encryptionAtHost.Description: Indicates whether or not resource disk encryption is enabled.

isEncryptionInTransitEnabled.Description: Indicates whether or not inter cluster node communication is encrypted in transit.

resourceProviderConnection.Description: The direction for the resource provider connection.

privateLink.Description: Indicates whether or not private link is enabled.

enableComputeIsolation.Description: The flag indicates whether enable compute isolation or not.

coresUsed.Description: The cores used by the cluster.

privateIPAddress.Description: The private ip address of the endpoint.

excludedServicesConfigId.Description: The config id of excluded services.

principalId.Description: The principal id of cluster identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id associated with the cluster. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.Description: The type of identity used for the cluster. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The list of user identities associated with the cluster. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.Description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client id of user assigned identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id of user assigned identity.

computeProfile.Description: The list of roles in the cluster.

installScriptActions.Description: The list of install script actions.

uninstallScriptActions.Description: The list of uninstall script actions.

httpsEndpoints.Description: The list of application HTTPS endpoints.

sshEndpoints.Description: The list of application SSH endpoints.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the application.

name.Description: The name of the script action.

roles.Description: The list of roles where script will be executed.

applicationName.Description: The application name of the script action, if any.

accessModes.Description: The list of access modes for the application.

destinationPort.Description: The destination port to connect to.

publicPort.Description: The public port to connect to.

privateIPAddress.Description: The private ip address of the endpoint.

subDomainSuffix.Description: The subdomain suffix of the application.

disableGatewayAuth.Description: The value indicates whether to disable GatewayAuth.

destinationPort.Description: The destination port to connect to.

publicPort.Description: The public port to connect to.

privateIPAddress.Description: The private ip address of the endpoint.

fqdn.Description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of host

effectiveDiskEncryptionKeyUrl.Description: The effective disk encryption key URL used by the host
